message:
We play with several 32-piece card decks from 7 to 10, jack (2 points), queen (3 points), king (4 points) and ace (11 points).

You can draw as many cards as you want and you will get them face down so only you can take a look at them. After each draw you can decide to draw another card or stop. You lose if you have drawn more than 21 points.
	

After you stop I will draw following the same rules. Then we show each other our cards. You win if you have more points than I have; otherwise you lose.
You win 1 gold.

replies.text: I am lucky since I was a child.

message: You win 2 gold.
You win 5 gold.
You win 10 gold.
[You have 2 points.] Do you want one more card?
[You have 3 points.] Are you finished?
[You have 4 points.] Do you risk taking another card?
[You have 5 points.] Are you finished [laughs]?
[You have 6 points.] Was that your last card?
[You have 7 points.] Do you want one more card?

[You have 10 points.] Do you risk taking another card? [Laughs]

[You have 15 points.] Do you want one more card?

[You have 17 points.] Do you risk to take another card?
[You have 18 points.] Do you want to stop?
[You have 19 points.] Was that your last card?
[You have 20 points.] Do you want one more card?

replies.text: Sounds stupid, but give me one more card.

message: [You have 21 points.] Do you want one more card?

replies.text: I know what I am doing. Give me one more card.

message: [You have 22 points and overdraw.] Bad luck for you.
[You have 23 points and you overdraw.] Next time you will be lucky.
[You have 24 points and you overdraw.] Don't give up.
[You have 25 points and you overdraw.] Double your bet and win back what you lost.

I have 15 points. You have a lot of luck.
[You show each other your cards]. I have 16 points and you lose. Next time you will be lucky.
